open.title: Frogfoot outage | Scottsville
open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Scottsville, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Frogfoot New Signups | National
open.description: We are investigating reports of no throughput affecting newly installed clients on the Frogfoot network. We are working on identifying and resolve this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: If any client experiencing no connectivity please contact Afrihost support on WhatsApp, Via email or Call Back for us to assist.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

open.title: Vumatel Maintenance | Gauteng, Mpumalanga & Limpopo
open.description: Vumatel is conducting maintenance in Gauteng, Mpumalanga & Limpopo from Wednesday, 14 May 2025 at 02:00 to 06:00, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre| Scheduled Network Maintenance
open.description: Metrofibre is conducting maintenance in Amberfield, The Reeds, Centurion, Rooihuiskraal, and Highveld from Tuesday, 22nd April 2025 at 22:00 to Friday, 25th April 2025 at 06:00, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
